me.soxey6.utils

Class ErrorHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.soxey6.utils.ErrorHandler
  • Deprecated. 
    The class contains functions for checking errors and a list of error codes. Description of values (+/-)X(X/Y)YY Where: + is a recoverable error and - is an unrecoverable The X is the catagory Three y is a Warning two are errors Ys define the specific error/warning.

    public class ErrorHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Soxey6
